DOC.brief_summary: Double blind , randomize , placebo-controlled , dose finding , multi-center , phase 1 trial 48 healthy volunteer subject . After completion screening procedure , subject randomize one four treatment group ( different dosage strength placebo ) All subject receive study treatment day 0 return day 28 . Subjects randomize treatment group two vaccination receive second treatment day 28 . Subjects return day 56 final visit .
DOC.brief_title: Zika-Vaccine Dose Finding Study Regarding Safety , Immunogenicity Tolerability
DOC.criteria: healthy volunteer age 18 55 subject child bear potential must perform reliable method contraception immune deficiency , history HIV , HBV , HCV drug addiction vaccination within 4 week prior study plan vaccination study prior receipt Zika vaccine recent infection 1 week prior screen relevant medical history interfere aim study neoplastic disease , hematological malignancy history autoimmune disease psychological condition affect ability participate study history severe adverse reaction vaccine administration history anaphylaxis allergic reaction , abnormal lab value , concomitant medication per decision investigator use immunosuppressive drug within 30 day screen plan use study receipt blood product within 120 day screen plan use study pregnancy , unreliable contraception method decision investigator regular blood plasma donor
